title: Did the Polio Vaccine Inspire ‘A Spoonful of Sugar’?
subtitle: The popular “Mary Poppins” song had a real-life story behind it.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The song “A Spoonful of Sugar,” written for the Disney movie “Mary Poppins," was inspired by the experience of one of the songwriters' children receiving an oral polio vaccine with a sugar cube.
